attributes.action: Give Palestinians a visa, Aid & a support scheme just like we did for Ukrainians
attributes.additional_details:
As only the Government and Parliament can help make a difference 
We should be remembered for supporting and helping the oppressed being a nation of sovereignty and power
attributes.background:
To give a similar level of support and Aid to the Palestinians just as we have done for the Ukranians 
This including helping many more injured children and allowing them and their families Visas, helping them rebuild their lives

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724433
